sourcesContent:
<template>
  <WeatherType/>
  <CurrentWeather/>
  <WeekForcast/>
  <Character/>
</template>

<script>
import Character from './components/Character.vue';
import CurrentWeather from './components/CurrentWeather.vue';
import WeatherType from './components/WeatherType.vue'
import WeekForcast from './components/WeekForcast.vue';
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    WeatherType,
    CurrentWeather,
    WeekForcast,
    Character
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getWeather();
  },
  data() {
    return {
      latitude: null,
      longitude: null
    }
  },
  methods: {
    async getWeather() {
      this.getLocation();
      await until(this.latitude).not.toBe(null);
      await until(this.longitude).not.toBe(null);
      axios.get(`https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast?latitude=${this.latitude}&longitude=${this.longitude}&hourly=temperature_2m,weather_code&current=temperature_2m&forecast_days=1`)
      .then((response) => {
        console.log('Response: ', response);
      });
    },
    getLocation() {
      navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition((posistion) => {
        this.latitude = posistion.coords.latitude;
        this.longitude = posistion.coords.longitude;
        console.log('Latitude: ', this.latitude);
        console.log('Longitude: ', this.longitude);
      });
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
